with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    eval(to_evaluate)
pytest.mark.parametrize('to_evaluate', [
    "Posinp([Atom('C', [0, 0, 0])], 'bohr', 'periodic')",
    "Posinp([Atom('C', [0, 0, 0])], 'bohr', 'periodic', cell=[1, 1])",
    "Posinp([Atom('C', [0, 0, 0])], 'bohr', 'periodic', cell=[1,'inf',1])"])
